Sentencas: A soft chemistry method was used to synthesize BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-delta (BCZY, with 0.0 <= x <= 0.8) proton conductors to combine the high proton conductivity of barium cerate and good chemical stability of barium zirconate.
Titulo: Tailoring the chemical stability of Ba(Ce0.8-xZrx)Y0.2O3-δ protonic conductors for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: To verify the chemical stability, all the synthesized oxides were exposed to 100% CO2 at 900 degrees C for 3 h and the phase composition of the resulting specimens was investigated by X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis.
Titulo: Tailoring the chemical stability of Ba(Ce0.8-xZrx)Y0.2O3-δ protonic conductors for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The chemical stability against CO2 increased with increasing the Zr content, with good results for samples with x >= 0.5.
Titulo: Tailoring the chemical stability of Ba(Ce0.8-xZrx)Y0.2O3-δ protonic conductors for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the samples was investigated as a function of the Zr content using Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) measurements.
Titulo: Tailoring the chemical stability of Ba(Ce0.8-xZrx)Y0.2O3-δ protonic conductors for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: Hydrogen-air fuel cell experiments were carried out at 700 degrees C using the BCZY proton conducting electrolytes and platinum electrodes.
Titulo: Tailoring the chemical stability of Ba(Ce0.8-xZrx)Y0.2O3-δ protonic conductors for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: Promising performance was observed for BaCe0.3Zr0.5Y0.2O3-delta because it maintains the good chemical stability of barium zirconate but with improved electrical conductivity and fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Tailoring the chemical stability of Ba(Ce0.8-xZrx)Y0.2O3-δ protonic conductors for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs)
